contact.p1: You can contact us at the below adresses:

whatWeDo.title: What is ParkMyst?
whatWeDo.p: ParkMyst is a tool to have fun. Be it a meeting with friends, a school trip or a company team-building event, ParkMyst makes everything more fun. With different quizzes, interactive tasks and 'treasure-hunt' like  sections, fun is guaranteed for everyone.

create.title: Create your own
create.p: With our intuitive systems, if you can dream a game, you can make it. With just the simple built-in building blocks you can have an addictive game up and running in no time!

about.title: ParkMyst;Gate
about.p: Fancy trying a game? Hop in one with ParkMyst;Gate and invite your friends too!

fast.p: Lightingâ€™s got nothing on us; on any device, anywhere.
fast.title: Fast

customize.p: There's nothing better than making your own game. With ParkMyst, you can do it effortlessly!
customize.title: Customisable

fun.p: Want to make a night out with friends or team building more fun? We've got you covered!
fun.title: Fun

title.motto:
Bringing people
together with the power
of entertainment
